title: I quit my Full time job. #R04D2D14M0ND
body:
I Main support. Looking for a team of 5 to experience real League of Legends.

Yes I had a full time job. I had what most were looking for, "financial security", living the Aussie dream. Yes I really did quit. Did I quit for Leauge? No. I quit for my own life. I want to live doing the things I love and enjoy. I want to chase my goals and dreams. I have ambitions and I will work hard towards it. One of those goals now is yes, #R04D2D14M0ND. I am seeking your help in achieving this goal. Can you help me?

I want to mention, No, I don't want you to boost me. Thank you for your act of kindness, I am looking for those who will teach me my mistakes. I am new to the game, YOU are the expert. By all means I have no intentions of being rude, ignorant, or selfish. I appreciate those who are helpful which I receive from friends in the League community. I thank you all for your kindness and support.

Communication is key, if YOU have any form of communication I'd love to be a part of it. 
- Newbskype (Skype)
- Eleven (Teamspeak)

Now let me as YOU:
Do YOU want to achieve Diamond?
Are YOU willing to grind your way to Diamond?
Think YOU are capable to be a mentor?
Do YOU love, enjoy and have a great time playing League?
Could YOU to teach me?

Post your IGN name here and I will be in touch with YOU.

Goals 
- Grind through bronze by the 1st of May 2016 (Completed)
- Reach Gold by 11th June 2016  
Current Mentorees
- Yoonji

Yours truly,

XI  

Bronze II -  31st March 2016 
Bronze I - 2nd April 2016
Silver V - 7th April 2016

replies.body:
Sometimes you lose 8 games in a row. 

It ain’t about how hard you hit. It’s about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward; how much you can take and keep moving forward. That’s how winning is done!

Shout out to Dragzneel for helping out of the loosing streak.

Yours truly,

XI

I'm diamond now and I remember my development as a player when I was on the road =D

I can tell you what I learned at each tier of the ladder and what it takes:

To be Bronze
Good understanding of game
Taking objectives will always be the best way to win. If you're 'super fed' but can't take a turret or buff after a teamfight... you're not actually winning. You got bored of normal games where people have perfect-build-mentality and 'don't care'. You know how to win and want to win, so you joined the ladder. 


To be Silver
Good set up - good runes/masteries, good diversity in unlocked champions, good item path, good gaming equipment
When I decided to get serious about LoL I unlocked the majority of champs and runes, and i upgraded my kit so i wouldn't have latency issues and so that i can see/hear more in game - bigger screen, better audio. I got a corded mouse so it felt more responsive. I had a rune/mastery set for every role/champion i play. Rune pages and Masteries are so important, as they can either help or stop you from farming easily at the start of the game, with the exception of keystones being about play style. Being zoned at level 1/2 and lagging out will kill your chances of winning immediately. Set yourself up to get ahead!


To be Gold 
Good mechanics (Farming, warding, team fights, pushing) 
Practice your champ enough that you can act instinctively. If you can harrass your lane opponent while last hitting, moving, and watching the mini-map, then you've made it mechanically. Build your core item before the other guy does then start applying the pressure and you'll probably succeed. Know your champion limits and power levels/spikes. Engage when you know you can inflict the most damage while using the least resource (your health is a resource).


To be Platinum 
Good counter-strategies and specialisation
Because everyone at this point is good mechanically, it can just be the minor differences in team composition that make or break a game. You'll want to have alternative options in select so you can make a better choice - Your team doesn't need another assassin! Don't pick that mage into Zed mid! How are you going to beat a Soraka as Janna? No one plays that champ since the patch!
You want what ever you pick to beat whatever they pick, so you need to master quite a few options. Then in game you want to build/play/pressure so that you exploit your opponents weaknesses and negate their strengths. Knowing all the champions in the game, knowing their strengths and weaknesses, their likely play style, and being able to respond to that with a deliberate champion choice, item path and play style - that's what got me to platinum.


To be Diamond 
Good leadership
To be diamond you can't just rely on your personal strengths and knowledge. Because everyone in platinum is amazing at their role and champion. You have to bring out the best in your team. Communication is so key, but also your actions. When you understand that every thing you do affects your team then you're starting to think like a leader. Toxicity kills teams because it breaks trust, breaks communication, breaks morale and it tries to justify selfishness. Leaders make good decisions that benefit the team and speak out against bad decisions. The Art of War by General Tsu helps. Be quick! Be deceptive! Plant a mole in the enemy camp!
From what i read of your posts it sounds like you'll be a good leader.


I feel sheepish for writing such an essay. Oh well, I just want you to succeed like i did. All the best

Congratulations on hitting Silver ElevenXI!

xo
-Yurified

Hit silver 5 lost 3 games in a row, still on 0 LP how do I know when Ill de-rank? Keep learning.

Yours truly,

XI

I have been receiving so much Support from YOU, who have been randomly adding me leaving motivating comments. A simple best of luck makes my day.
I wanted to give a shout out to whitePumah and friends for being so ever kind in ranking with a bronze like me. 

Silver 5

Yours truly,

I'd love your help. Thank you for your advice. I'll sure take it on board.

Yours truly,

XI

g'day mate, im looking for some people who are serious wbout the climb. i suffered a fair bit and left for a while but im back... in bronze 5 ;-; but you can check my stats onlineand everything. i work well with people who are nice and know their roles and who to focus. i added you and would like to see if we could play ranked some time :D (also i can play any role)

> [{quoted}](name=YimieroX,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=Hxdl7vm5,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-04-05T00:56:53.450+0000)

Hey buddy, I got your request and have accepted. I hope to have a game with you in the future!

Yours truly,

XI

Do YOU ever get blamed for loosing the game? are YOU trying to learn the game? What do YOU do to improve?

Almost hit Silver 5, lost 3/5 matches. Dropped down to 47 LP. Loosing promo series is a great way to learn. 

Think of the positives. You get one free win when you reach promos again.

http://imgur.com/d2chWc8

Yours truly,

XI

Bronze I aiming for Silver. It's been tough. stuck on a win loss win loss win loss streak.

At the end of the day some you win some you don't.

Yours truly,

XI

Thank you Kitty Katt.

Yours truly,

XI
